about_the_game:
Welcome to 'Pallet Panic,' the ultimate warehouse management experience! Step into the fast-paced world of industrial logistics and prove your skills as the master forklift operator. With a cartoony and lighthearted art style, 'Pallet Panic' challenges you to navigate a chaotic factory, managing machines and pallets in a thrilling, competitive environment.

Key Features:

  • Top-Down Challenge: View the factory from above as you take control of a forklift, racing against the clock in 12-minute play sessions, each representing a workday.
  • Competitive Showdown: Compete with players worldwide for the title of the ultimate forklift operator and strive to achieve the highest score.
  • Mix and Match: Combine inbound pallets of different colors and types to create outbound pallets, showcasing your logistics skills.
  • Cartoony Fun: Immerse yourself in a colorful and playful world filled with cartoony visuals and a whimsical atmosphere.

Are you ready to embrace the warehouse chaos and emerge as the top forklift operator in 'Pallet Panic'? Get ready to load, lift, and lead your way to the highest score and claim your spot in the competitive world of industrial fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 190 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 190 MB available space

name: Pallet Panic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 190 MB available space

short_description: Dive into 'Pallet Panic,' an action-packed forklift frenzy that blends strategic logistics with fast-paced fun. Manage the chaos of a vibrant factory, combining, lifting, and racing to become the ultimate forklift operator. Unleash your skills in this whimsical world of cartoony mayhem!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Swedish*
*languages with full audio support
